title: Business Card Logo Font
content:
I apologize for not be very descriptive. I would enjoy the help in indentifying the font used in this image:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202448im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Evil_Geniuses_logo_final_5412.png)

Thank you!

Font: 

 Knockout-28-Junior Featherweight 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202448/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: JoshMPLS

comments.content:
How about Hoefler Type Foundry - Knockout-28-Junior Featherweight  
http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/styles/

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202448im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gen1_5989.jpg)

It looks like **[Knockout #28 Junior Featherwt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202448/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Hoefler%2BFrere-Jones&ffam=Knockout%20HTF28-JuniorFeatherwt%20-%20Regular&fid=3b9f5585978745ff2a3fc98cc42260ea&fsize=60&text=EG%20EVIL%20GENIUSES&wrap=2)** by Hoefler&Co [1990]
